{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Huawei |model=AP7130DN-AC |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date= |manuf_country= |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=access point |fcc_id= |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe=at |cpu1_brand= |cpu1_model= |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=32 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=256 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand= |wi1_chip1_model= |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_none= |eth_cpu= |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=2 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} '''AP7130DN-AC Dual-Band Access Point'''
[http://enterprise.huawei.com/en/products/network/wlan/ap/hw-198374.htm Product page] [http://enterprise.huawei.com/ilink/enenterprise/about/news/news-list/HW_198472 '''''Huawei Announces Commercial Availability of Industryâ€™s First Enterprise-level 802.11ac Access Point''''' - '''Huawei''' press release] (dated 2012-12-06) Specifications, per '''Huawei''''s product page, follow... *System memory: 256 MB DRAM, 32 MB Flash memory *Max. concurrent users: 128 *Dimensions (H x W x D): [[Dimensions::53 mm x 220 mm x 220 mm]] *Weight: [[Weight::1.3 kg]] This device is almost certainly '''Broadcom''' based.. at least for Wi-Fi. It may be using BCM4706.
